item.description:
He's Back! If you missed our Foreclosure Training before, now's your chance to make serious money. Some of our own Metro West Members have made money using these strategies already!!
Our Speaker is Ron Bouchard and Ron is returning with even more info than before. Don't miss out in learning how to invest in foreclosures and don't miss out on the Huge money you can make!!

RSVP today. And remember to bring your notebooks because there will be a lot of info!

Search for investment properties online at [url=http://www.ListRightRealEstate.com]http://ListRight... Real Estate

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group
